sentences.en: A firm secures a needed commodity and is protected against price fluctuation.
sentences.cn: 公司得到需要的商品,而且不会由于价格变动而受损失.

sentences.en: Can it be moral to make so much money out of a commodity which is essential to life?
sentences.cn: 靠着一种生活必需品赚这么多钱，这在道德上说得过去吗？

sentences.en: Commodity money typically is based on valuable metals, particularly gold or silver.
sentences.cn: 商品货币通常是以贵重金属, 特别是以黄金或白银作为其基础的.

sentences.en: Commodity prices remain stable and there are plenty of goods on the market.
sentences.cn: 商品价格稳定,市场货源充足.

sentences.en: Commodity traders fall into two broad categories: hedgers and speculators.
sentences.cn: 经营商品的人可分为两大类: 做套期保值的人和投机商.

sentences.en: Gradually commodity production becomes the dominating form.
sentences.cn: 商品生产逐渐地成了统治的形式.

sentences.en: Like any other commodity, pedigree dogs are covered by the Sale of Goods Act.
sentences.cn: 像其他商品一样，纯种狗的买卖同样受《货物买卖法》的约束。

sentences.en: Money followed, the general commodity with which all others 101 were exchangeable.
sentences.cn: 随后就出现了货币, 即其余一切商品都可以和它交换的普遍商品.

sentences.en: Money was a commodity she never thought about except in the abstract.
sentences.cn: 钱对她来说就是个抽象的东西，她从不去想钱。

sentences.en: Other middle - income oil importers would suffer from continued low commodity prices.
sentences.cn: 其它中等收入石油进口国将受到持续的产品价格低的害处.
圆滑老练是很有用处的.

sentences.en: The authorities took measures to roll commodity price back.
sentences.cn: 当局采取措施使物价全面回降.

sentences.en: The group became a sales juggernaut in the commodity options business.
sentences.cn: 这个集团成为了商品期权交易市场的销售巨头。

sentences.en: There is an abundance of commodity supplies on the markets.
Thousands of individuals, in contrast, trade in commodity futures as speculators.
sentences.cn: 但成千上万的个人却是做期货生意的投机商.

phrases.tran_cn: 商品展览会；物资交流会

trans.tran_en: a product that is bought and sold
